messages.title: What's at stake for our country, you and your family at this election?
messages.content: While the parties make promises about how much they will spend, what matters most is having the plan that will create the jobs and strong economy needed for that spending. Only the Conservatives can deliver a strong economy after we have left the EU.

messages.title: Let's get Brexit done - so we can finally get on with the priorities we all share.
messages.content: We can't afford MORE confusion and MORE delay. But that's all the other parties can deliver. The Labour Party has wasted the last THREE YEARS blocking the Brexit deal in Parliament. Only the Conservatives can get Brexit done and fully get us out of the EU by January 31st.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest an extra £33.9 Billion into the NHS. Hiring more doctors and nurses.
Recruiting 20,000 more police officers and giving them the resources they need.
Raising the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour and cutting tax for the lowest paid.

mentions.tacticalSituation: I am the only candidate who can beat Jeremy Corbyn's Labour Party in this constituency. No other party comes close.

issues.brexitEurope: Only the Conservatives can deliver a strong economy after we have left the EU. Get Brexit done by January 31st.
issues.economy: We can't afford MORE confusion and MORE delay. But that's all the other parties can deliver.
issues.environment: Saving our green spaces. And we’re leading the world in tackling environmental pollution, investing more in green technologies.
issues.government: The Labour Party has wasted the last THREE YEARS blocking the Brexit deal in Parliament.
issues.health: Investing an extra £33.9 Billion into the NHS, hiring more doctors and nurses.
issues.labourEmployment: Raising the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour and cutting tax for the lowest paid.
issues.lawCrime: We’re recruiting 20,000 more police officers and giving them the resources they need.
issues.transport: Better public transport. We’ve delivered more new trains, more direct rail services, and new transport facilities including Birkenhead.
issues.socialWelfare: Raising the Living Wage to £10.50 an hour and cutting tax for the lowest paid.

community.content: New help for tenants. But where's Labour? Labour run councils, like Council in Kendal, stole tens of thousands in rip-off charges. But we're on your side. Tackling Town Hall waste, holding Labour-run councils to account for those massive bills, and making sure your tax money goes further: That's what we've all been working for.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have met many people who, regardless of how they have voted before, feel let down and ignored by the MPs who were supposed to represent them. While I will not spend this campaign criticising Angela Eagle personally, she has voted six times on Brexit. I believe in the People. I am a candidate who is willing to deliver Brexit, regardless of how voted before, to fight for Wallasey, and to vote for the priorities in our public services that we will want to see.

quotes.text: Jeremy Corbyn's Labour cannot be trusted to govern.

images.caption: Photo of James Baker with local supporters.
